CostBook.name: CostBook
CostBook.description: Represents the cost book that contains multiple cost book entries.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date and time when the cost book comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: Date and time till when the cost book is no longer in effect.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether the cost book is default (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.
